casebody.data:
Claude QUEEN, Employee
v.
PENSKE CORPORATION, Employer and
Kemper c/o Gallagher Bassett, Carrier. No. 15P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Joy H. Brewer, Cary, for Penske Corporation. Mark T. Sumwalt, Vernon Sumwalt, Charlotte, for Claude Queen.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th day of January 2006 by Defendant (Penske Corporation) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."
